results.title: The Girl I love: music video for the band Positronic
results.creator_credit: Stephen Clarke and Advanced Diploma of Multimedia (ADoM), Swinburne University of Technology (formerly Electronic Design and Interactive Media (EDIM)
results.brief_description: This animated music video was created in 3D studio Max for student’s band - Positronic. Although it was the first time that he had used this software, he makes the most of simple scenes, metaphorical imagery and 3D ariel effects to effectively communicate the song’s message - A small town girl leaves her home to find fame and fortune in the big city, leaving beind her boyfriend who must come to terms with her departure.
results.title_for_label: The Girl I love: music video for the band Positronic
results.creator_credit_for_label: Stephen Clarke and Advanced Diploma of Multimedia (ADoM), Swinburne University of Technology (formerly Electronic Design and Interactive Media (EDIM)

Although it was the first time that he had used this software, he makes the most of simple scenes, metaphorical imagery and 3D ariel effects to effectively communicate the song’s message - A small town girl leaves her home to find fame and fortune in the big city, leaving beind her boyfriend who must come to terms with her departure.

results.title: The Dead Weight of a Quarrel Hangs
results.brief_description: Walid Raad’s Dead weight of a quarrel hangs examines the legacy of the Lebanese Civil War through the stories omitted or seen as unimportant in the official histories. Remnants of film and photography, snapshots and surveillance video footage are transformed to create an archive to “another” Lebanese Civil War.
results.title_for_label: The Dead Weight of a Quarrel Hangs
results.description: Walid Raad’s Dead weight of a quarrel hangs examines the legacy of the Lebanese Civil War through the stories omitted or seen as unimportant in the official histories. Remnants of film and photography, snapshots and surveillance video footage are transformed to create an archive to “another” Lebanese Civil War.
description_for_label: Walid Raad’s Dead weight of a quarrel hangs examines the legacy of the Lebanese Civil War through the stories omitted or seen as unimportant in the official histories. Remnants of film and photography, snapshots and surveillance video footage are transformed to create an archive to “another” Lebanese Civil War.
